text: Karen Delaney St. Croix Popeil Finster Walker or Karen Delaney was a character on the NBC television series Will & Grace. She was played by Megan Mullally. Karen was a friend with gay actor and dancer, Jack McFarland. She was in a relationship with Stanley Walker but ended it and married Beverley. Karen appears with Megan Mullally in The Megan Mullally Show. Category:Will & Grace characters
title: Karen Walker
